channel.title: Glories and Dueling Rings
channel.description:
Hey there,
Anybody have any idea how to add glories and dueling rings rub and teleport you to the options just like runescape?
Thanks, J a y

item.title: Glories and Dueling Rings
item.dc:creator: @J_a_y J a y
item.description:
@J_a_y wrote:

Lalala, i love rich yes i do =D <3[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2008, 08:32:50 am[/size][hr]Rich, help me with this glorytele = true, so it goes from (4) to (3) etc?

Read full topic

item.title: Glories and Dueling Rings
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Packet 75

Here’s my glory tele;

if (item2ID3 == 1712 && actionTimer <= 0) { sendMessage("You rub the amulet..."); deleteItem(1712, getItemSlot(1712), 1); actionTimer = 7; glorytele = true; addItem(1710, 1); selectoption("Where would you like to go?", "Ancient pyramid", "Shantay pass",""); sendMessage("The amulet has 3 uses left."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Glories and Dueling Rings
item.dc:creator: @J_a_y J a y
item.description:
@J_a_y wrote:

Iv’e never seen it work on any other server than Delta’s, it doesn’t work on mine =[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2008, 08:20:34 am[/size][hr]It would go something like

if(ItemID == 1712){ if(rub); showInterface(2480); } teleto(2311, 1322); }

But i need to declare what rub is, how would i declare ‘rub’? I so need to edit that code

Read full topic
